resources.string: Installer APK requires permission to access storage
Installer APK requires permission to use Shizuku Server
Unable to perform open with during ongoing installation

What is Installer APK?
Installer APK is an app that lets you install multiple APKs as if it was a single package. This is useful for installing apps that are distributed as App Bundles since Android provides no built-in way to install them from sources other than Google Play.

How to use Installer APK?
Click "Install APKs" button and select base APK and additional configuration-specific APKs or a ZIP archive that contains all required APKs, then click "Select" button to start installation process.

.apks
You can rename a .zip archive that contains .apk files to .apks (e.g.: somesplitapp.zip -> somesplitapp.apks), so it can be opened with Installer APK from other apps.

Installing apps from external storage
You can long click install button to select files via system file picker that supports external storage.
Unable to acquire root access, proceeding with rootless installer
Unable to install the app because it conflicts with an already installed app with same package name
Application is incompatible with this device
Not enough storage space to install the app
Your ROM is incompatible with rootless installer. Try selecting another installer in Installer APK settings.
Unable to access Shizuku Server, please make sure it\'s running and Installer APK is authorized to use it
Error while extracting APK files from ZIP: %s
ZIP doesn\'t contain any apk files
You must select either a single .zip/.apks file or multiple .apk files
You have to select one or more .apk/.apks/.zip files, no mixed extensions allowed
You have to select either a single .zip/.apks file or multiple .apk files
Unable to get APK size from the archive, please enable \"Extract APKs from archives\" setting and try again

Seriously, read this one-time warning!

Sorry for taking your time, but I'm really tired of people with MIUI who have been skipping the previous version of this warning.

Looks like your device is running MIUI. MIUI is known for breaking standard Android API features and a lot of Installer APK users have reported installations failing on MIUI for no reason with "Installation failed". Usually it can be fixed by disabling MIUI optimizations in developer settings, which I suggest you should do.

Of course you can try using Installer APK without disabling MIUI optimization, but if it doesn't work, try disabling it before complaining to me about failed installations. If your MIUI version doesn't have that toggle or it doesn't help, there's nothing I can do.

This issue is supposed to be fixed on MIUI 20.2.20 and up (xiaomi.eu and eu-based ROMs).
Unable to open developer settings. You can try opening them manually, google how to do that.
Long click to use system file picker.\n(Click this tooltip to hide it forever)
Archive can\'t be read the normal way. Please enable \"Use ZipFile API\" toggle in settings and try again.

There\'s already a package installer session being committed for this package name
One of the child package installer sessions does not match the parent session in respect to staged or rollback enabled parameters

Backup of %d apps has been cancelled

Managed backups are currently in beta, please report issues in Installer APK's GitHub repo (you can find the link on about screen)

Backup files format
Installer APK backups apps as .apks files (which are just ZIP archives with .apk files) with some meta information added to the archive (such as app name and icon). Backed up .apks files can still be installed as normal .apks files (because they are normal .apks files, except for some additional files in the archive which are ignored by installer)

What is backed up
Currently Installer APK backups only apps APK files (no data/obb/etc)

External changes to backup directory
Installer APK doesn't automatically keep track of external changes done to files in the backup directory. So, if you've changed them outside of Installer APK, use reindex option in 3-dots menu at the top right of backup screen to rescan backups directory.

You can always open this help from the 3-dots menu at the top right of backup screen
Do you want to backup all split APKs?
Do you want to backup %d selected apps?
Select split APK parts to backup
Unable to get split APK parts
Selection was cleared due to app list update
App failed to load or was deleted
Backup has been added to installer queue
Older version of an app cannot be installed over a newer version. You need to delete the app to be able to restore this backup
Please select a directory to store backups. .apks files exported with Installer APK in the selected directory will be indexed as backups.
Current backups directory: %s\n\nNote: Installer APK will only show backups from the currently selected directory.
Unable to open app in system settings
Export a single selected part as a .apk file. Exported .apk files are not backups and won\'t be managed by Installer APK
Try using rooted installer. If Installer APK is unable to acquire root access it will fallback to rootless installer

Extract APK files from .zip/.apks archives into temporary files before installing them. If disabled, Installer APK will install APKs directly from archives without temp files. Not recommended to enable

Use ZipFile API to read ZIP archives (including .apks files), solves compatibility issues with some archives. Not recommended to enable unless an installer error message asks you to because this adds otherwise unnecessary overhead

In Pro mode, when Installer APK is unable to find meta information (such as icon and title) about an app in the source (such as a .apks file or a ZIP archive), it will copy the base APK to a temp file and parse it directly to obtain meta information about the app. Installer APK will not copy and parse APKs larger than 100MBs
Installer to use for APKs installation.\nCurrently: %s
You don\'t have Shizuku installed, please get it from Google Play and set it up
Installer APK doesn\'t support Shizuku on Android versions lower than 6.0
Directory where backups will be stored. Installer APK will automatically index all valid backups in the selected directory if you change it.\nCurrently: %s
Use legacy installer implementation. Installer APK will be restarted to apply this setting (Don\'t switch if there are ongoing installations or backups, they may be corrupted)
Show dialogs when installation fails or succeeds. You can always open those dialogs manually by tapping installation session entry. Only affects new installer
Show contextual app feature badges on backup screen
Automatically switch between selected light and dark themes depending on system theme
Please note that following the system theme may not work correctly on Android versions lower than Q

Enable installer Pro mode that allows you to select parts to install from a .apks file (or other archives with multiple APK files). Please note that Pro mode is experimental and it may not work properly, feedback is welcome

Allow Installer APK to collect analytics data such as app usage data and errors. You can find out more about data being collected in Privacy Policy which you can find on about screen. Changing this setting may not fully apply it until you restart Installer APK
Enable opening .apk files via Installer APK
Support opening .apk files via Installer APK from other apps. Can be disabled since on some ROMs this setting being enabled doesn\'t let you open .apk files at all
Select parts to include in backup file name
Please select at least one part

string.name: sss_warning_summary
string.b: Don\'t touch anything here unless you know what you\'re doing. Some options here can break Installer APK or even damage your system

resources.string: Custom install-create command that will be used to create pm session used in Rooted and Shizuku installers, the command must not contain any spaces except for the ones that separate arguments (\'spaces in quotes\' will be split into arguments as well). Enter \"null\" to disable
Add constant timestamp (Jan 1 2000, 00:00) to backups. Makes hashes of backup files of the same APK files same. Installer APK will have no idea what backup is the latest one though
Depending on your MIUI version, turning off MIUI optimization may do nothing, reset apps permissions or have other unexpected consequences

Hello. As you know, Installer APK is a completely free open-source app and it will always stay that way. If you like it, please consider supporting Installer APK by making a donation. You will also get the legendary Installer APK Gold theme!
Huge thanks for supporting Installer APK!\nDon\'t forget to check out your new Installer APK Gold theme

Hello. You\'re using FLOSS version of Installer APK. As you know, Installer APK is a completely free open-source app and it will always stay that way. If you like it, please consider supporting Installer APK by making a donation.\n\nIn FLOSS version, the FLOSS Gold theme is available by default.
Unable to get donation status. Please make sure you have Google Play Services installed and try restarting your device.
Your donation is pending. If it isn\'t applied automatically after you complete it, please restart Installer APK.
Unable to connect to Google Play. Please make sure you have Google Play Services installed and try restarting your device.

Split APK parts with unknown purpose, please open an issue on Installer APK\'s GitHub and attach this APK or at least a screenshot of parts names if you encounter this. It is highly recommended to install these parts unless you know their exact purpose

There are some architecture configuration split parts for feature \"%s\", but none of them is supported by your device

None of locale configuration split parts for feature \"%s\" match your languages

This app is huge (>150MB). With huge apps there\'s a chance (the bigger the app size, the higher) that installation will hang but app will still take up storage space that you won\'t be able to reclaim without using root or doing factory reset
File is too big to copy and your system doesn\'t support reading SAF files without copying

On Android 11 and up Installer APK requires storage permission to directly read files selected via system file picker due to scoped storage implementation making 0 sense. You can deny storage permission, but then Installer APK will have to copy selected files to parse them, Installer APK won\'t copy and parse large files.
